title: This Blog Now Supports Your Language
description: I wanted to have language options on my website that preserved jargon and conveyed more of my voice (in the case of Graflect, phonologically). Google et al deserves the credit.

title: ▤ Graflect Chart and Tool
description: Chart mapping the Graflect phonetic orthography to the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA). Graflect transliteration tool available.

title: ⌻ pictures from Elizabeth Park, Hartford, Connecticut
description: A photo gallery from the Elizabeth Park Rose Garden in Hartford, CT. Macro shots of roses, other flowers, and bees.

title: ⌻ pictures from Dixie and Vegas
description: My first photo gallery after getting back into photography. A collection of images from trips around St. George and Las Vegas.

title: Sunshine Keyboard
description: An old article about my first-ever custom keyboard. This documents my original process prototyping with cardboard.
